mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.GOODS_NO, A.BASKET_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, A.BASKET_GOODS_AMOUNT, A.GOODS_ATT_NO, D.GOODS_THUMBNAIL, E.GOODS_ATT_SIZE, E.GOODS_ATT_COLOR, E.GOODS_ATT_AMOUNT, D.GOODS_NAME, D.GOODS_SELL_PRICE, D.GOODS_SALE_PRICE, M.MEMBER_GRADE FROM BASKET A, GOODS D, GOODS_ATTRIBUTE E, MEMBER M WHERE A.MEMBER_NO= #{MEMBER_NO} AND A.GUBUN = '0' AND A.GOODS_NO=D.GOODS_NO AND A.GOODS_ATT_NO=E.GOODS_ATT_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODS_LIKE ( LIKE_NO, GOODS_NO, MEMBER_NO, LIKE_DATE ) VALUES ( LIKE_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, ${GOODS_NO}, #{MEMBER_NO}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.GOODS_NO, A.BASKET_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, A.BASKET_GOODS_AMOUNT, A.GOODS_ATT_NO, E.GOODS_ATT_SIZE, E.GOODS_ATT_COLOR, E.GOODS_ATT_AMOUNT, D.GOODS_NAME, D.GOODS_SELL_PRICE, D.GOODS_SALE_PRICE, D.GOODS_THUMBNAIL, M.MEMBER_GRADE FROM BASKET A, GOODS D, GOODS_ATTRIBUTE E, MEMBER M WHERE A.MEMBER_NO= #{MEMBER_NO} AND A.BASKET_NO IN (${SELECT_BASKET_NO}) AND A.GOODS_NO=D.GOODS_NO AND A.GOODS_ATT_NO=E.GOODS_ATT_NO
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BASKET WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{MEMBER_NO} AND BASKET_NO IN (${BASKET_NO}) AND GOODS_ATT_NO IN (${GOODS_ATT_NO})
